meanings.sent1: The outfit she wore to the party was the unhippest one there.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed wearing the unhippest shoes to school.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked at her with the unhippest expression when she tried to dance.
meanings.sent4: His unhippest dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent5: The unhippest hat she owned was bright pink with polka dots.

meanings.sent1: The old car he drove was the unhippest vehicle in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Her unhippest hairstyle made her stand out in a bad way.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his friends with the unhippest joke, but it fell flat.
meanings.sent4: The unhippest music playing in the store made customers leave quickly.
meanings.sent5: The unhippest sunglasses he owned were scratched and outdated.
